desc.en: The Los Angeles Metro Rail is an urban rail transit system serving Los Angeles County, California in the United States. It consists of six lines: four light rail lines (the A, C, E and K lines) and two rapid transit lines (the B and D lines), serving a total of 101 stations. The system connects with the Metro Busway bus rapid transit system (the G and J lines), the Metrolink commuter rail system, as well as several Amtrak lines. Metro Rail is owned and operated by the Los Angeles County Metropolitan Transportation Authority (Metro).
desc.zh-Hans: 洛杉矶Metro Rail是一个服务于美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶县的城市轨道交通系统。它由六条线路组成：四条轻轨线路（A、C、E和K线）和两条地铁线路（B和D线），共服务于101个车站。该系统与Metro Busway快速公交系统（G和J线）、Metrolink通勤铁路系统以及几条Amtrak线路相连。Metro Rail由洛杉矶县大都会运输管理局（Metro）拥有和运营。
